description:
Shachi is a wielder of the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist. His goal is to overthrow the three generals of Asura who rule the Land of Asura. Meanwhile, Kenshiro meets Shachi`s former lover, Leia, who tells him to kill Shachi, now steeped in evil. Shachi is stopped during his pursuit. In a fight between Kaizel, who can steal a man`s insides without damaging his exterior, and Shachi, what will the outcome be!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Elle ose parler de l`amour à la fin du siècle ! Son nom est Leïa !
Love Is Preached in the Century`s End! Her Name Is Leia!!
あえて世紀末に愛を説く! その名はレイア!!
